# NSSpellChecker.OptionKey

**Structure**

Constants that define options for text checking.

## Declaration

```swift
struct OptionKey
```

## Overview

The constants are optional keys that can be used in the options dictionary parameter of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/check(_:range:types:options:inSpellDocumentWithTag:orthography:wordCount:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/requestChecking(of:range:types:options:inSpellDocumentWithTag:completionHandler:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/menu(for:string:options:atLocation:in:)] methods.

## Spell Checker Options

- **documentAuthor**: An NSString containing the name of an author to be associated with the document
- **documentTitle**: An NSString containing the title to be associated with the document.
- **documentURL**: An NSURL to be associated with the document.
- **orthography**: An `NSOrthography` instance indicating an orthography to be used as a starting point for orthography checking, or as the orthography if orthography checking is not enabled.
- **quotes**: An `NSArray` containing four strings to be used with `quoteCheckingResult(range:replacementString:)` (opening double quote, closing double quote, opening single quote, and closing single quote in that order).
- **referenceDate**: An NSDate to be associated with the document, used as a referent for relative dates; if not specified, the current date will be used.
- **referenceTimeZone**: An NSTimeZone to be associated with the document, used as a reference for dates without time zones; if not specified, the current time zone will be used.
- **regularExpressions**
- **replacements**: An NSDictionary containing replacements to be used with NSTextCheckingTypeReplacement; if not specified, values will be taken from user’s preferences.
- **selectedRange**

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Type Properties

- **generateInlinePredictionsKey**

## Data Detector Interaction

- **menu(for:string:options:atLocation:in:)**: Provides a menu containing contextual menu items suitable for certain kinds of detected results.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
